```{r}
library(malariaAtlas)
library(tidyverse)
theme_set(theme_classic())
```




```{r}
# get parasite rate
kenya_pr <- tibble::as_tibble((malariaAtlas::getPR(ISO = "KEN", species = "BOTH")))
```

```{r}
kenya_pr %>% 
    group_by(year_start) %>% 
    summarise(examnd = sum(examined),
              pstv = sum(positive),
              studies = n()) %>% 
    mutate(proportion = pstv / examnd) %>% 
    ggplot(aes(year_start, proportion)) +
    geom_line()
```
